mapper.select: select topic_tbl.topic_no, topic_tbl.user_no, topic_type, topic_title, topic_short_cont, topic_progress, debate_tot_pro, debate_tot_con, debate_tot_neut, op_cnt from topic_tbl left join debate_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = debate_tbl.topic_no left join (select count(op_no) as op_cnt, topic_no from opinion_tbl) as op_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = op_tbl.topic_no where topic_progress = 3 order by topic_no desc;

select topic_tbl.topic_no, user_no, topic_type, topic_title, topic_short_cont, topic_progress, recomnd_cnt from topic_tbl left join (select count(recommend_tbl.topic_no) as recomnd_cnt, topic_no from recommend_tbl) as recommend_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = recommend_tbl.topic_no where topic_progress = 1 order by topic_no desc;

select topic_tbl.topic_no, topic_tbl.user_no, topic_type, topic_title, topic_short_cont, topic_progress, debate_tot_pro, debate_tot_con, debate_tot_neut, op_cnt, recomnd_cnt from topic_tbl left join debate_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = debate_tbl.topic_no left join (select count(op_no) as op_cnt, topic_no from opinion_tbl) as op_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = op_tbl.topic_no left join (select count(recommend_tbl.topic_no) as recomnd_cnt, topic_no from recommend_tbl) as recommend_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = recommend_tbl.topic_no where topic_progress = 4 order by topic_no desc;
